name: Odoo - Apache 2.4 Inverse Proxy
tagline: How-to deploy an Apache 2.4 inverse proxy to serve Odoo v8 applications
body:
* Install Apache 2.4 inverse proxy
* ReverseProxy to Odoo with
** workers = 1
** workers > 1
* SSL setting up
** Redirect HTTP to HTTPS
** Creating a PKI using XCA
* Access restriction
** via source IP ranges
** via client certificate
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
